title: What Riot considered the nerf to AP Kog'maw

replies.body: What I find even funnier is you expected Riot's balance team to actually do something right.

They're quite gentle with the nerfs to the champions they like.  It's just with the champions that they don't care too much about where they start going "Hmm they're a tad strong.  Let's nerf them... there... and there... and there and there."

They actually have been a lot more gradual with balance changes in the last couple months (not all the time, but mostly), but it looks like that's fading again.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VciXpvH2,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-09T00:16:20.693+0000)
>
> They're quite gentle with the nerfs to the champions they like. 

Yeah, the ones that the pros play in the LCS, but even then its only ever the same champions over and over. heaven forbid someone new (Like Poppy) ever see some LCS play lest they get nerfed for it (Which she did/is going to be)

The fact as a company Riot SHOULDN'T be playing favorites at all but sadly they do and that's why we have such a one sided meta to begin with.
